ing nonlinear beam at a new frequency, provides a compact way

in NPCs are limited to two dimensions.
High conversion efﬁciency requires one dimension for QPM
while nonlinear beam shaping in free space requires two
additional dimensions for full wavefront modulations. There-
fore, except for few cases that investigate nonlinear beam
have suffered from low conversion efﬁciency. The general

The recent breakthrough in three-dimensional (3D) NPC
for achieving efﬁcient nonlinear beam shaping. Such 3D NPCs

dition at the same time. In this work, we fabricate the specially-
orientation of the 3D NPC structure, the biggest nonlinear
crystal is utilized under our experi-
